Item.criteria: <Item type="tp_Block" action="get" page="1" select="classification,is_template,item_number,name,xml_schema,created_by_id,created_on,modified_by_id,modified_on,locked_by_id,major_rev,css,current_state,keyed_name,new_version,generation,release_date,effective_date,is_current" pagesize="50" maxRecords=""><is_template condition="eq">1</is_template></Item>
Item.label: Templates
